author_ssm: Jasmine Soliman for Akkasah: Photography Archive at NYUAD
unittitle_ssm: Little Aden Oil Refinery - Anglo-Iranian Oil Company (AIOC)
abstract_ssm: A collection of photographs most likely taken by "a British Representative" of the Anglo-Iranian Oil Company (AIOC) at the Little Aden oil refinery. The photographs focus on group and individual portraits of workers and locals and the equipment and facilities connected to the construction of the oil refinery at Little Aden, which began operating in July 1954.
